idea: We VAYUVENTS PRIVATE LIMITED since 2010 believe That The Establishment Of An Effective Quality Will Help Our Company Achieve Its Vision Of Becoming A Highly Respected Manufacturer Of Different Type Of Blower, Fan And Pollution Control Machine.

idea: Gati NXG is an entry into personal transportation products market with an intent to deliver fitness, mental wellbeing and a physical activity with comfort. “A ride at the dawn or the early morning gets us closure to the natural atmospheric elements and as well reduces the stress, apart from just enduring physical fitness”; a thought that the founders envisage and believe in cascading it to the generation further. The thought and the passion later got transformed into the profession of bicycle manufacturing. Mumbai is where our manufacturing hub resides with us catering to the markets locally and some major sectors of Maharashtra with a plan of PAN India expansion at the earliest.
name: GATI NXG INDUSTRIES

idea: Stepout live is an unique aggregator, which lists all Restaurants/Restobars/ Clubs/Bars/Pubs in the region on single dedicated Platform. It provides patrons with real-time attractive offers and multiple choices.
name: Stepout Live Media And Technology

idea:
ASCENTech is the  right choice Backend solutions. we provided online gaming solutions to well-known companies like Shapoorji & Pallanji, Videocon, Martin Agencies, etc. and we have our presence into African markets as well. Apart from gaming solution, Ascentech also provides ERP solutions to Municipal Corporations (Urban Local Bodies), Restaurants, etc.

ASCENTech specializes in real-time Offsite Data capture and processing tools riding on Mo-devices (mobiles & Tablets) platform. It leverages Compu-nicating (Computing & Communicating) Power of Mobile, Data Management capabilities of the Cloud. Our solutions are affordable, adaptable and flexible, ensuring the ability to adapt to and leverage the constant change and opportunities in the marketplace. Our innovation-driven development approach and thought leadership in various domains give us an edge over our competition.
name: ASCENTECH INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY PRIVATELIMITED

idea: We are a house of complete hospitality and facility management arm for service industries.
